LanguageData.SD_Reason_Downed: Cannot activate search and destroy for a downed pawn.
LanguageData.SD_Gizmo_Melee_Description: Activate search and destroy for a melee pawn.
LanguageData.SD_Gizmo_Ranged_Description: Activate search and destroy for a ranged pawn.
LanguageData.SD_EnableSearchAndDestroy_Description: If disabled, your pawns will no longer have the search and destroy functionality.
